verses.text: Whosoever believeth \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* loveth \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* begot, loveth \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w keep|strong="G4160"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* charity \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w heavy|strong="G0926"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* whatsoever \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, overcometh \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w victory|strong="G3529"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* overcometh \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* overcometh \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* believeth \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*?

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*: \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G1223"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* testifieth, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w And|strong="G3140"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* give \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w* \w in|strong="G3588"\w* heaven, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Father, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Word, \w and|strong="G3140"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Holy Ghost. \w And|strong="G3140"\w* \w these|strong="G3748"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w that|strong="G4151"\w* give testimony \w on|strong="G1519"\w* earth: \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w these|strong="G3588"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w greater|strong="G3173"\w*. \w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w greater|strong="G3173"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w testified|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*.

\w He|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* believeth \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, hath \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*. \w He|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* believeth \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, maketh \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w liar|strong="G5583"\w*: \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* believeth \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w testified|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w us|strong="G1325"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*.

\w He|strong="G2192"\w* \w that|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, hath \w life|strong="G2222"\w*. \w He|strong="G2192"\w* \w that|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, hath \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G3778"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w confidence|strong="G3954"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* towards \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w That|strong="G3754"\w*, whatsoever \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* heareth \w us|strong="G0191"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* heareth \w us|strong="G0191"\w* whatsoever \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w ask|strong="G0154"\w*: \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* petitions \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w request|strong="G0154"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* knoweth \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w let|strong="G2443"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w ask|strong="G0154"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* sinneth \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*. \w There|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* unto \w death|strong="G2288"\w*: \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w I|strong="G1437"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w ask|strong="G0154"\w*.

\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w iniquity|strong="G0093"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* unto \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.

\w We|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* whosoever \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, sinneth \w not|strong="G3756"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* generation \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* preserveth \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w wicked|strong="G4190"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* toucheth \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w We|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* seated \w in|strong="G1722"\w* wickedness.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w come|strong="G2240"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w us|strong="G1325"\w* \w understanding|strong="G1271"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w true|strong="G0228"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w true|strong="G0228"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*. \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w true|strong="G0228"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w*.
\w Little|strong="G5040"\w* \w children|strong="G5040"\w*, \w keep|strong="G5442"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w idols|strong="G1497"\w*. Amen.
